      • decodePublicKey

        public ECPublicKey decodePublicKey(String keyType,
                                   InputStream keyData)
                            throws IOException,
                                   GeneralSecurityException
        Specified by:
        decodePublicKey in class AbstractPublicKeyEntryDecoder<ECPublicKey,ECPrivateKey>
        Parameters:
        keyType - The reported / encode key type
        keyData - The key data bytes stream positioned after the key type decoding and making sure it is one of the supported types
        Returns:
        The decoded PublicKey
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to read from the data stream
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to generate the key

      • encodePublicKey

        public String encodePublicKey(OutputStream s,
                              ECPublicKey key)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: PublicKeyEntryDecoder
        Encodes the PublicKey using the OpenSSH format - same one used by the decodePublicKey method(s)
        Parameters:
        s - The OutputStream to write the data to
        key - The PublicKey - may not be null
        Returns:
        The key type value - one of the PublicKeyEntryDecoder.getSupportedTypeNames()
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to generate the encoding
